content.question: Which of the following code segments assigns the same value to result as the preceding code segment for all values of str?

choices.label: int result = 0; if (str.indexOf("A") < 0) { result = 3; } else if (str.indexOf("B") < 0) { result = 2; } else if (str.length() > 5); { result = 1; }
int result = 0; if (str.indexOf("A") < 0) { if (str.length() > 5) { result = 1; } else if (str.indexOf("B") < 0) { result = 2; } else { result = 3; } }
int result = 0; if (str.indexOf("A") < 0) { if(str.length() > 5) { result = 1; } else { result = 3; } } else if (str.indexOf("B") < 0) { if (str.length() > 5) { result = 2; } }
int result = 0; if (str.indexOf("B") < 0) { if (str.length() > 5) { result = 2; } } else if (str.indexOf("A") < 0) { if (str.length() > 5) { result = 1; } else { result = 3; } }

content.answer: int result = 0; if (str.indexOf("A") < 0) { if(str.length() > 5) { result = 1; } else { result = 3; } } else if (str.indexOf("B") < 0) { if (str.length() > 5) { result = 2; } }

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
